item.title: AceBear Security Contest House-of-loop
item.description: House-of-loop Hi everyone, this is the writeup for the challenge House-of-loop in the AceBear Security Contest 2019 Description We are given a stripped ELF x64 binary which can be interacted with, our task is to get remote code execution(RCE). The binary presents us 3 options: Create, View and Delete a note. When creating a note, we have 3 fields: Title, Private, and Description. We have the limits on Title, Private field length but with Description, we can use as much as we specified.
